name: The Essence of Lavender Spa Gift Basket - spa baskets for women gift
description: Send her an indulgent spa experience right at home with this exquisite spa gift basket featuring all Lavender products. Lavender offers a calming and soothing spa experience she is sure to appreciate. Includes, Lavender lotion, Lavender body scrub, Lavender moisturizing body wash gel, Lavender soothing bath salts, Lavender body mist, Lavender hand cream, Lavender body soap, Lavender Tealite Candles, lavender room diffuser, body massager, foot roller massager, Lavender rose petal fizzies, bath pillow, 2 pillar candles,  loofah rope, pedicure paddle with brush in a stained willow tray and topped with a lavender hand made bow. This gift weighs 8 pounds and measures 17x12x12
